creator.description: User id that created the folder; could be a system user

modifier.description: User id that last updated the folder; could be a system user

created.description: Date the folder was added to the system

modified.description: Date the folder was last modified

cmisFolderId.description: CMIS Folder ID uniquely identifying this folder in the CMIS repository

parentFolderId.description: ID of the parent folder; if null, this folder is a top-level folder and has no parent
